duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and maintain rapport with key store individuals while providing outstanding customer service and maximizing sales.
Conduct effective planning & order-writing, as well as supporting and completing activities such as merchandising displays and partnering with nationally recognized customers.
Ensure that leading brands are well represented, stocked, and maintained through the implementation of company guidelines.
Support negotiations with store managers and communicate any issues with the management team.
Work in conjunction with merchandisers to ensure inventory is fully stocked, rotated, and presentable at all times.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Physically move products from the stock rooms and stock the store’s shelves.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. College degree preferred.
